description:
Lina`s party gets to Sayloon kingdom. However, what waited for them was the funeral of Amelia`s father, the first successor of the kingship of the country, Phil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Eternal! The Day Prince Phil Died?
Eien Nare! Phil-san ga Shinda Hi?
Fii nemuritor / Ziua în care a murit prinţul Phil?
Pour l`éternité (Le jour de la mort de Phil ?)
Живи вечно! День смерти принца Фила?
永遠なれ! フィルさんが死んだ日?
